Posts.Content: Sep 21, 2011 07:55AM momof3infla wrote: Good morning, I'm new here and just loving this site.  Meeting so many wonderful ladies.  I was diagnosed with IDC, stage 1 BC in April 2011, had BMX in May 2011.  My worry is that I have only been put on Tamoxifen for five years.  No chemo or rads.  I don't understand why no radiation followup just to be on the safe side. Oncologist said that the Mammoprint test came back so low risk that it wouldn't benefit me by getting radiation.  I'm not complaining here, just have that constant worry that we all wake up with.  Also, he said no scans are necessary anymore.  At all.  I just take their word for it that it's all OK?
